content.prompt: Napoleonâ€™s establishment of what he called republics in various conquered territories is best explained by

choices.label: his intention to prepare those provinces for eventual self-rule
his nominal adherence to the French Revolutionary principle of popular sovereignty
his desire to win recognition and acceptance from conservative monarchies in Europe
his hope to experiment with various governmental models for possible application in France

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
